thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shandong Jincheng Pharmaceutical Group sees 2017 net profit up 65 pct to 95 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shandong Jincheng Pharmaceutical Group sees 2017 net profit up 65 pct to 95 pct

organizations.name: shandong jincheng pharmaceutical group co ltd

text:
Jan 16(Reuters) - Shandong Jincheng Pharmaceutical Group Co Ltd
* Sees 2017 net profit to increase by 65 percent to 95 percent, or to be 263 million yuan to 310.8 million yuan
* Says 2016 net profit was 159.4 million yuan
* Says that inclusion of new company as the main reason for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/NQNFJA
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
